## Before Submitting

Please ensure this feature request is specific to the PostgreSQL backend implementation. If the feature is related to ActiveRecord/ActiveQuery functionality that should be consistent across all backends, please submit the feature request at https://github.com/rhosocial/python-activerecord/issues instead.

A clear and concise description of the desired feature for the PostgreSQL backend.
